resourceWidth.description: The width of the video resource used by the component (unit: px)
resourceWidth.description_zh: 组件使用的 video 视频资源的宽度（单位：px）

resourceHeight.description: The height of the video resource used by the component (unit: px)
resourceHeight.description_zh: 组件使用的 video 视频资源的高度（单位：px）

canvasStyle.description: CSS style for animating the canvas
canvasStyle.description_zh: 用于设置动画画布的 CSS 样式

path.description: Animated resource addresses, supporting relative paths and remote addresses. If it is a remote path, note that Access-Control-Allow-Origin needs to be set in the response header to prevent cross-origin problems
path.description_zh: 动画资源地址，支持相对路径以及远程地址。如果是远程路径，注意 response header 里需要设置 Access-Control-Allow-Origin 来防止跨域问题

loop.description: Whether the animation loops or not

alphaDirection.description: The direction of the alpha channel in the video resource, left indicates that the alpha channel is on the left side of the asset, and right indicates that the alpha channel is on the right side of the asset. For more information, see Transparent Video Design Resource Examples
alphaDirection.description_zh: 视频资源中 alpha 通道的方向，left 表示 alpha 通道在资源的左边，right 表示 alpha 通道在资源的右边。详情请参考透明视频设计资源示例

onStarted.description: A callback for the animation to start playing

onEnded.description: Trigger the ended event when the playback reaches the end (callbacks are triggered when the natural playback ends, but not when the loop ends and pauses the animation)
onEnded.description_zh: 当播放到末尾时触发 ended 事件（自然播放结束会触发回调，循环播放结束及暂停动画不会触发）
